title: Block AI crawlers in robots.txt
description: Update public/robots.txt to disallow GPTBot, ChatGPT-User, ClaudeBot, CCBot, PetalBot, Amazonbot, Bytespider, Applebot-Extended, Google-Extended. Keep existing permissive rule for legitimate search engines and sitemap directive.

title: Early address validation in /profile/[address] route
description: Add regex check for valid Ethereum address format (0x + 40 hex chars) at the top of ProfilePage before any imports/queries run. Return notFound() immediately for invalid addresses. Also wrap getAddress() in try/catch as safety net. Would have turned 430s of wasted compute into near-instant 404s.

title: Add Edge middleware for bot UA blocking
description: Create middleware.ts at project root. Runs on Vercel Edge Runtime (zero serverless cost). Check User-Agent header against blocklist of AI crawler UAs and return 403 before hitting serverless functions. Matcher scoped to dynamic routes (/profile/:path*, /hypercert/:path*).

title: Bot crawling attack mitigation
notes: Child tasks: ecocertain-7dp (robots.txt), ecocertain-ebu (middleware), ecocertain-att (address validation)
